4-11  都営日暮里・舎人ライナーの駅別乗降車人員 (平成29～令和3年度） 4-11 NUMBER OF PASSENGERS ON TOEI NIPPORI-TONERI LINER TRAINS BY STATION ( Fiscal Years 2017-2021 )
各駅の乗降車人員は最新年度1年間の合計である。同一会社内の乗り継ぎは除く。  ※印は区部にある駅 (線) を示す。

The number of boarding and deboarding passengers for each station is a one-year total for the most recent fiscal year. Figures exclude transits between lines of the same company. The lines and stations marked with ※ refer to the ones located in the ku area.
